oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Morganton Academy
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Established early 1800's as a Methodist Church. Later became a college with a dormitory and two teacher's houses. Closed in 1936, then became Morganton Baptist Church February 10, 1940. This structure built in 1900.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Looking Back at Tennessee Photograph Collection, 1890-1981
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Schools; Educational facilities; Buildings; Churches; Methodist churches
